Third Voice Cleaner

10 Jun 1999

I guess most people will know about Third Voice. There's now a JavaScript fix which claims to clean the pesky varmits off your site. (click here for the zipped file)\n

\nOur very own Jeff Howden has also released some code for defeating Third Voice which can be found on the archives. - djc
